amendment.description: To provide for the conveyance of land at Fort Ritchie, Maryland.

vote.text: Amendment SA 805 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S6893; text: CR S6893) To provide for the conveyance of land at Fort Ritchie, Maryland.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 805 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Sarbanes.
